name: HaoHuaqing's Personal Website
tagline: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
body:
### Introduction
Welcome to My GitHub Pages,I'm HaoHuaqing,a student,graduated from Sichuan University in July 2016,studying biomedical engineering in Shanghai Jiao Tong University now.

### Work
In June 2015,I took part in Robomaster National Robotics Competition sponsored by DJI.We designed and manufactured robots in three mouths.The final competition was just like First Person Shooter Game in which five people using computers to operate the robots against the other five people.It's the best competition I entered during my bachelor study.   
      
![image1](HaoHuaqing.github.io/image/3.jpg) 

From March to June in 2016,I did my Graduation Project.I used Kinect to measure joint angle,based on Kinect for Xbox One，Kinect for Windows SDK version 2.0.Used in Rehabilitation Engineering，non-contact, rapid measurement of the joint angle, to assess the effect on patient treatment.You can see the code here:[KinectMeasureJointAngle](https://github.com/HaoHuaqing/KinectMeasureJointAngle)      
    
![image2](HaoHuaqing.github.io/image/4.jpg)   

### Contact
GitHub:  @HaoHuaqing   
Twitter: HaoHuaqing   
Gmail:   mobeimao@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
